content.text: I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition. I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
I enjoy cooking my favorite Asian food with my son. I love the game halo. I own a german shepard. I can't get enough of rap music, it's so good. I like to make fresh pies.
That's great! I'm glad you have a close relationship with your son. I also love Asian food. What's your favorite dish to cook?
I love to cook pad thai. It's easy to make and it's always a hit with my family.
That sounds delicious! I've never had pad thai before, but I'm going to have to try it now.
You won't regret it! It's one of the most popular dishes in Thailand.
I can imagine. It sounds amazing.
I also like to cook chicken teriyaki. It's a little more complicated to make, but it's also really good.
That sounds great too. I love chicken teriyaki.
I'm glad we have similar tastes in food.
Me too! I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
Me too! I love to cook and I'm always looking for new ideas.
I think we're going to be good friends.
